name: Community-Based Psychological Defense
description: Strengthening collective mental resilience to prevent PSN manipulation within communities.

cards.title: Building a Psychological Immunity Culture
cards.description: Developing long-term resistance against PSN psychological warfare.
bulletpoints: Training community members to detect and resist emotional manipulation.
Creating shared knowledge bases of PSN tactics for collective awareness.
Promoting critical thinking as a cultural norm to prevent social engineering.

cards.title: Deploying Mass Psychological Resilience Training
cards.description: Fortifying entire communities against PSN propaganda and coercion.
bulletpoints: Integrating psychological defense principles into local education systems.
Using community role models to reinforce resilience strategies.

cards.title: Preemptively Undermining PSN Influence Structures
cards.description: Eliminating vulnerabilities before they can be exploited by PSNs.
bulletpoints: Identifying and neutralizing ideological weak points in the community.
Reinforcing social bonds to prevent infiltration-based control tactics.
Establishing alternative information channels resistant to PSN misinformation.
